my_business:
I Represent My Company ACME India Engineering Technologies Pvt. Ltd. We are the authorized dealers and  cater Sales & Service of Air Conditioners & Refrigeration products  Manufactured by Multinational Companies, Viz; Mitsubishi, Daikin, O- General, Hitachi, LG & Toshiba. 
 
My expertise Consultation, Feasibility, Design & Execution of HVAC & Refrigeration Systems for Domestic & Commercial Applications
top_product: Mitsubishi VRF Air Conditioning Systems with inverter ( Variable Speed) compressor equipped with Variable Frequency Drive.
ideal_referral: Any individual, corporate, commercial, private & public sector enterprises looking for HVAC & R solutions and applications. Window Air Conditioner to Central Plants.
top_problem_solved: Case Study : RCI DRDO. The HVAC consultant Mr. Sudhakar was facing challenges to incorporate VRF Systems. We have done the feasibility, Design and executed the erection & Commissioning. Case Study: Hotel GRAND Solitaire. Executed erection & commissioning VRF Systems. The management requested to incorporate the same in the another location where the Hotel was using chilled water Air Conditioning. We have executed with minimum salvage of the existing systems. Case Study : AP Tourism Monuments TARAMATI BARADARI. Govt. appointed Architect & Designer. M/s. Nitish Roy & Designs. Installing Aircon systems was a challenge due to RCC Grid Ceiling and beam heights. High wall mounted splits were not possible due to the Heritage Artifacts mounted on the walls. We have designed a solution and recommended Cassette Type Aircons to accommodate with the limited available space.
my_favourite_bni_story: There are many stories as I aged in BNI GRAND. I would like to share my story of Joining BNI. In the year 2102 Mr. Ajit Panicar Managing Director of M/s. Nova Industries (Mumbai) has introduced BNI Concept to me. I was not convinced but still had a belief in him. I have decided to Join only after my season as it was a peak summer season. I have visited Mr. Rambabu Aakella who is an Architect and his company name is M/s. Paripoorna Designs. On his desk i saw the Card File Of BNI and asked him to introduce me to the chapter. As he is inducted in GRAND i was introduced to GRAND. It was a second launch of the Chapter and i had no second opinion to fill in my application and Join the chapter. I was inducted in the Next Week and i was allowed to give my 30 Seconds Presentation. I have got referrals and i have given referrals to the group. One Referral was from Mr. Prakash Bollekia. I have called to the individuals whom referrals are given. It was only a Disappointment and the last call to be made is the referred person given by Mr. Prakash. This individual has given an appointment and I called upon. To my surprise the individual is none other than Mrs. Prakash. They own a property M/s. Rajahadahi Hotel in Nampally, Hyderabad. They procured 26 Air Conditioners and signed a Service contract to maintain there existing Air conditioners. There after my Confidence and Trust to the system has developed. I have participated as member following the Structured Agenda of the system. I have taken the responsibility as Committee Member, I have chaired the weekly meetings as a President and have been absorbed in the Dream Team.
